entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @FoxNews Trump admitted that making it easier to vote in America would hurt the Republican party. We need reforms such as vote-by-mail, same-day registration and early voting as states seek to safely run elections amid the Covid-19 pandemic are a must to protect our Republic’s Democracy.
